metadata.description:
"I laughed so hard at HEY MISTER! that about two drops of pee came out." -- Matt Fraction, author of Invincible Iron Man, Hawkeye, and Casanova

Behold the triumphant return of what Details Magazine called "America's funniest comic book"! This Eisner-nominated series series is not only "laugh-out-loud, tears-rolling-down-your-face funny" (Karon Flage, Sequential Tart), it's the first project Chris Staros and Brett Warnock published together as Top Shelf Productions!
metadata.name: Hey, Mister
